name: rootPath
description: Set the first 'file' that displays on load. If omitted, the first file found will be selected

name: expandFolders
description: Enables/disables if folders are expanded on load

name: explorerStyle
description: Shows the explorer in one of allowed styles

name: buttons.addFile.visible
description: Include the 'Add File' button for a given explorer tree

name: buttons.addFolder.visible
description: Include the 'Add Folder' button for a given explorer tree

name: buttons.delete.visible
description: Include the 'Delete' button for a given explorer tree

name: allowKeyboardEventsOnFocus
description: Allows users to use pre-determined keyboard shortcuts while they are navigating the tree with arrow keys and on focus

name: buttons.*.text
description: Customize the text for a button listed below
